long_description: This revised edition of Canyoneering Arizona is your key to discovering America's most diverse canyon country. Author: Tyler Williams. Softcover, 230 pages, black-and-white and color photos. Funhog Press; copyright 2005. Provides information for more than 60 canyon routes, to include general description, best season for hiking, elevation, distance and duration. Also provides ratings for degree of technical difficulty, pertinent maps, permit requirements, access and shuttle information and extended narrative. Includes scores of line-drawn maps.
short_description: This revised edition of Canyoneering Arizona is your key to discovering America's most diverse canyon country.
